title: Surf's Up, North Korean Style: An Unlikely Enterprise
text: BING NEWS: Surf's Up, North Korean Style: An Unlikely Enterprise Pyongyang's desire to earn money from tourism led to an unlikely enterprise at a new coastal resort with New Jersey-based tour company. Watch the day’s top stories and analysis to help wrap up your day.
